CheckBoxPreference.android:title: ASM CPU cores
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable Cyclone (M68000 ASM CPU core) and DrZ80 (Z80 ASM CPU core) using internal compatibility list. Disable it (needs app restart) to get maximum accuracity and compatibility at the expense of performance.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Threaded Sound
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable it to get smoother gameplay in some cases but worse sound quality

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Show FPS
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable it to turn FPS display on

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Show Info/Warnings
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Shows Game Info and any warnings when a game is selected

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: FPS limit when filtering enabled
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable it to limit frames rendered when filtering is activated to reduce jitter. Disable it to get full FPS if your device is powerful enough

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Define Keys
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Select to map emulator stick and buttons to physical keys. (Xperia Play and any other devices with physical keyboards users should configure their buttons or keys here)

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Animated touch control. Disable for performance.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Touch controller visible
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Disable to get more room for scaling if not need it

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Smooth scaling
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Select to turn bitmap filtering on, at the expense of performance
